cards.name: Lord of Atlantis
cards.text: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

cards.name: Malcolm, Keen-Eyed Navigator
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever one or more Pirates you control deal damage to your opponents, you create a Treasure token for each opponent dealt damage. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

cards.name: Bridge from Below
cards.text:
Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, exile Bridge from Below.

cards.name: Mephidross Vampire
cards.text:
Flying
Each creature you control is a Vampire in addition to its other creature types and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."

cards.flavor: "The trick to getting the biggest share is to be the last one standing."
cards.name: Pitiless Plunderer
cards.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

cards.name: Breeches, Brazen Plunderer
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever one or more Pirates you control deal damage to your opponents, exile the top card of each of those opponents' libraries. You may play those cards this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

cards.name: Dargo, the Shipwrecker
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of artifacts and/or creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each permanent sacrificed this way and {2} less to cast for each other artifact or creature you've sacrificed this turn.
Trample
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

cards.flavor: Unlike their pack-hunting kin, ferocidons stalk in solitude and lash out at everything that approaches.
cards.name: Rampaging Ferocidon
cards.text:
Menace
Players can't gain life.
Whenever another creature enters, Rampaging Ferocidon deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

cards.name: Underworld Breach
cards.text:
Each nonland card in your graveyard has escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast cards from your graveyard for their escape cost.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Underworld Breach.

cards.flavor: Outsiders may marvel at the Sun Empire's "domesticated" dinosaurs, but those who live alongside them know they can never truly be tamed.
cards.name: Carnage Tyrant
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Trample, hexproof

cards.name: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
cards.text:
This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control.
Trample

cards.flavor: If you see one, you're already surrounded.
cards.name: Polyraptor
cards.text: Enrage - Whenever Polyraptor is dealt damage, create a token that's a copy of Polyraptor.

cards.name: Kalamax, the Stormsire
cards.text:
Whenever you cast your first instant spell each turn, if Kalamax, the Stormsire is tapped, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Whenever you copy an instant spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Kalamax.

cards.name: Lord Windgrace
cards.text:
[+2]: Discard a card, then draw a card. If a land card is discarded this way, draw an additional card.
[−3]: Return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
[−11]: Destroy up to six target nonland permanents, then create six 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature tokens with forestwalk.
Lord Windgrace can be your commander.

cards.name: Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist attacks, each opponent can't block with more than one creature this combat.
As long as Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist is tapped, no more than one creature can attack you each combat.

cards.flavor: "When you go where the currents take you, you'll never run short of things to discover."
cards.name: Thrasios, Triton Hero
cards.text:
{4}: Scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, draw a card.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

cards.flavor: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.
cards.name: Mana Crypt
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.flavor: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.
cards.name: Mana Crypt
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.flavor: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.
cards.name: Mana Crypt
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.flavor: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.
cards.name: Mana Crypt
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.flavor: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.
cards.name: Mana Crypt
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.flavor: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.
cards.name: Mana Crypt
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.flavor: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.
cards.name: Mana Crypt
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

cards.name: Star Compass
cards.text:
Star Compass enters tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.

cards.name: Ghostly Prison
cards.text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

cards.name: Fabricate
cards.text: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Show and Tell
cards.text: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Tragic Slip
cards.text:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Morbid - That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

cards.name: Victimize
cards.text: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Gamble
cards.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.

cards.name: Crashing Footfalls
cards.text:
Suspend 4-{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {G} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)
Create two 4/4 green Rhino creature tokens with trample.

cards.name: Tireless Tracker
cards.text:
Landfall - Whenever a land you control enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on Tireless Tracker.

cards.name: Drown in the Loch
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Counter target spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.
• Destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.

cards.name: Field of the Dead
cards.text:
Field of the Dead enters tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
Whenever Field of the Dead or another land you control enters, if you control seven or more lands with different names, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

cards.name: Stoneforge Mystic
cards.text:
When Stoneforge Mystic enters, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Brazen Borrower
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
Brazen Borrower can block only creatures with flying.

cards.name: Petty Theft
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor:
"It is one thing to run away. It is quite another to escape your fate."
-Oko
cards.name: Desertion
cards.text: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.

cards.flavor: "It's downright selfish to die with full pockets."
cards.name: Morbid Opportunist
cards.text: Whenever one or more other creatures die, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

cards.flavor: "We're taking back what's ours. And a little bit of what's yours."
cards.name: Port Razer
cards.text:
Whenever Port Razer deals combat damage to a player, untap each creature you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
Port Razer can't attack a player it has already attacked this turn.

cards.flavor:
"These people come from their cities and think to tame the wilderness. They forget that here, the wilderness has a head start."
-Selvala
cards.name: Scapeshift
cards.text: Sacrifice any number of lands. Search your library for up to that many land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: Travelers who have reached the headwaters of Fool's Fall say that strange serpents dwell in the waters there, though none can recall any more than that.
cards.name: Mystic Snake
cards.text:
Flash
When Mystic Snake enters, counter target spell.

cards.flavor: "All these childhood memories are getting in the way of the vault codes."
cards.name: Notion Thief
cards.text:
Flash
If an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"Only a fool goes out there unprepared. If the heat doesn't get you, the time alone with your thoughts likely will."
-Ertha Jo, frontier mentor
cards.name: Desert
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate only during the end of combat step.

cards.flavor: When Kellan let his eyes wander to the horizon, he saw a land whose destiny was as uncertain as his own.
cards.name: Prismatic Vista
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Prismatic Vista: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: Its gaze gifts you with knowledge no mortal mind should possess.
cards.name: Thought-Knot Seer
cards.text:
({C} represents colorless mana.)
When Thought-Knot Seer enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.
When Thought-Knot Seer leaves the battlefield, target opponent draws a card.

cards.flavor: Sagas sing of realms long forgotten, shattered by doomskars and cleaved violently from the World Tree.
cards.name: Prismatic Ending
cards.text: Converge - Exile target nonland permanent if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

cards.flavor:
"No one has heard Drivnod speak. But we have seen him do unspeakable things. As he drifts over Ish Sah, a deathly whisper rides the wind. I can never watch for long-I turn away and hide."
-Kara Vrist, resistance spymaster
cards.name: Dismember
cards.text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"I paid a price to one I will not name to escape the abyss. A bit of my soul for a second chance. And I'd do it again, and again-until I had no soul left to trade."
-Tinua, Skirsdag cultist
cards.name: Persist
cards.text: Return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.

cards.flavor: "Art exposes truth. Each step of my dance brings me closer to the secrets of the universe."
cards.name: Expressive Iteration
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, put one of them on the bottom of your library, and exile one of them. You may play the exiled card this turn.

cards.name: Solitude
cards.text:
Flash
Lifelink
When Solitude enters, exile up to one other target creature. That creature's controller gains life equal to its power.
Evoke-Exile a white card from your hand.

cards.name: Subtlety
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Subtlety enters, choose up to one target creature spell or planeswalker spell. Its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
Evoke-Exile a blue card from your hand.

cards.name: Grief
cards.text:
Menace
When Grief enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Evoke-Exile a black card from your hand.

cards.name: Fury
cards.text:
Double strike
When Fury enters, it deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers.
Evoke-Exile a red card from your hand.

cards.name: Endurance
cards.text:
Flash
Reach
When Endurance enters, up to one target player puts all the cards from their graveyard on the bottom of their library in a random order.
Evoke-Exile a green card from your hand.

cards.name: Solitude
cards.text:
Flash
Lifelink
When Solitude enters, exile up to one other target creature. That creature's controller gains life equal to its power.
Evoke-Exile a white card from your hand.

cards.name: Subtlety
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Subtlety enters, choose up to one target creature spell or planeswalker spell. Its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
Evoke-Exile a blue card from your hand.

cards.name: Grief
cards.text:
Menace
When Grief enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Evoke-Exile a black card from your hand.

cards.name: Fury
cards.text:
Double strike
When Fury enters, it deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers.
Evoke-Exile a red card from your hand.

cards.name: Endurance
cards.text:
Flash
Reach
When Endurance enters, up to one target player puts all the cards from their graveyard on the bottom of their library in a random order.
Evoke-Exile a green card from your hand.

cards.flavor: "I'm not as quick as I used to be, but the wheat doesn't mind."
cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

cards.flavor: "Pah! You call this a comprehensive? I call this nest-stuffing!"
cards.name: Ledger Shredder
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a player casts their second spell each turn, Ledger Shredder connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

cards.flavor: For every five you see, there are fifty you don't.
cards.name: Rat Colony
cards.text:
Rat Colony gets +1/+0 for each other Rat you control.
A deck can have any number of cards named Rat Colony.

cards.flavor: Each of them is a bad influence on the rest.
cards.name: Relentless Rats
cards.text:
Relentless Rats gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield named Relentless Rats.
A deck can have any number of cards named Relentless Rats.

cards.flavor:
"Anyone can live next door, but when you fight to defend your neighbors, you become a village."
-Rho, veteran hero
cards.name: Kindred Charge
cards.text: Choose a creature type. For each creature you control of the chosen type, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: The magic of the land is a thread that weaves all of Valley into a tapestry, connecting even the most distant of friends.
cards.name: Sylvan Tutor
cards.text: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

cards.name: Toski, Bearer of Secrets
cards.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Indestructible
Toski, Bearer of Secrets attacks each combat if able.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"It started as a prototype for a frog diving suit, but the internal mechanisms didn't leave room for the frog."
-Fitzwhisker, otterfolk inventor
cards.name: Frogmite
cards.text: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

cards.name: Sword of Fire and Ice
cards.text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from red and from blue.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, Sword of Fire and Ice deals 2 damage to any target and you draw a card.
Equip {2}

cards.name: Secluded Courtyard
cards.text:
As Secluded Courtyard enters, choose a creature type.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type or activate an ability of a creature source of the chosen type.

cards.flavor: Bound to a single house, Valgavoth simply expanded its boundaries until it consumed the plane, turning a vibrant world into his playground of terror.
cards.name: Damnation
cards.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor: Survivors who stay together, slay together.
cards.name: Collected Company
cards.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
